item.value: package JDBC_Apart\.Util;\R\Rimport java\.io\.InputStream;\Rimport java\.sql\.Connection;\Rimport java\.util\.LinkedList;\Rimport java\.util\.Properties;\R\Rimport javax\.sql\.DataSource;\R\Rimport com\.alibaba\.druid\.pool\.DruidDataSourceFactory;\R\Rpublic class SQL_Util \{\R\tprivate static Properties p = new Properties\(\);\R\tstatic LinkedList<Connection> pool = new LinkedList<>\(\);\R\tstatic DataSource dataSource;\R\R\t// 读取和加载properties文件\R\tstatic \{\R\t\ttry \{\R\t\t\tInputStream in = Thread\.currentThread\(\)\.getContextClassLoader\(\)\.getResourceAsStream\("db\.properties"\);\R\t\t\tp\.load\(in\);\R\t\t\tdataSource = DruidDataSourceFactory\.createDataSource\(p\);\R\t\t\} catch \(Exception e\) \{\R\t\t\te\.printStackTrace\(\);\R\t\t\}\R\t\}\R\R\t// //获取连接\R\tpublic static Connection getcom\(\) \{\R\t\ttry \{\R\t\t\tConnection com = dataSource\.getConnection\(\);\R\t\t\treturn com;\R\t\t\} catch \(Exception e\) \{\R\t\t\te\.printStackTrace\(\);\R\t\t\}\R\t\treturn null;\R\t\}\R\R\tpublic static Connection realGetcom\(\) \{\R\R\t\tSystem\.out\.println\("从池中获取一个连接"\);\R\t\tConnection conn = pool\.removeFirst\(\);\R\t\tSystem\.out\.println\(conn\);\R\t\tConnectionWarp myConn = new ConnectionWarp\(conn, pool\);\R\t\treturn conn;\R\t\}\R\R\t/\*\R\t \* public static void close\(Connection com, Statement st, ResultSet rs\) \{ try \{\R\t \* if \(rs != null\) \{ rs\.close\(\); \} \} catch \(Exception e2\) \{ \} finally \{ if \(st\R\t \* != null\) \{ try \{ st\.close\(\); \} catch \(SQLException e\) \{ \} \} if \(com != null\)\R\t \* \{ try \{ com\.close\(\); \} catch \(SQLException e\) \{ e\.printStackTrace\(\); \} \} \} \}\R\t \*/\R\}\R
